S

SaltedHashGenerator - Class in jsalt
This class aims to provide a simple API to generate salted hash encryptions for plain text passwords.
SaltedHashGenerator(String) - Constructor for class jsalt.SaltedHashGenerator
Sets the digest algorithm to use.
SaltedHashGenerator(StandardJSEAlgorithms) - Constructor for class jsalt.SaltedHashGenerator
All the named Message Digest Algorithms present in JSE are supported by the use of the enum StandardJSEAlgorithms.
SaltedHashGenerator(String, boolean) - Constructor for class jsalt.SaltedHashGenerator
This constructor works as SaltedHashGenerator(String) and provides a convenient way to set if the generated passwords should be encoded as Base64.
SaltedHashGenerator(StandardJSEAlgorithms, boolean) - Constructor for class jsalt.SaltedHashGenerator
This constructor works as SaltedHashGenerator(StandardJSEAlgorithms) and provides a convenient way to set if the generated passwords should be encoded as Base64.
StandardJSEAlgorithms - Enum in jsalt
This enum lists the JSE provided encryption algorithms.
suspendEncoding() - Method in class jsalt.Base64.OutputStream
Suspends encoding of the stream.
